sentences.sContent: The impatient drivers were beeping their horns.
sentences.sContent_eng: The impatient drivers were beeping their horns.
sentences.sCn: 不耐烦的司机们在按喇叭发嘟嘟声。

sentences.sContent: One thing I’ve noticed is that when people have to wait, they become impatient or uncomfortable.
sentences.sContent_eng: One thing I’ve noticed is that when people have to wait, they become impatient or uncomfortable.
sentences.sCn: 我注意到一件事，就是当人们在等待的时候，人们会变的没有耐心、焦躁不安。
